subject: feat(ui): add alpha badge to title and persistent PWA update banner
body:
The app title now displays an "Alpha" badge next to "Graphiki" to signal
the current development phase. The PWA update notification is moved from
the hamburger menu (where it was hidden on mobile) to a persistent
full-width banner below the header, ensuring users always see when a new
version is available â€” critical for PWA installs where the browser
refresh button is not accessible.
